inn1.comm: edged and....it didn't carry! Another quick, good length delivery moving across the stumps, sucked Atapattu into a prod as it slanted past him, and the edge flew fast and low to Robin Uthappa at second slip, but replays show that it hit the ground just before his fingers grasped it...Ganguly from first slip appeals vociferously to the umpires, who go upstairs and the big screen flashes that Atapattu is 'NOT-OUT'...
good ball again! Good length pitched on leg stump and climbing, catches Atapattu going forward but that was too high over the stumps, the umpire reasons
good length ball again, moving away and he leaves it be
strays down leg stump this time and Atapattu tries the flick, but ends up with a legbye just wide of square leg
a tad fuller to the left-hander, who comes forward and dabs it in front of point, looking for the single, but he's wisely sent back
and he begins with a real loosener, a swinging full toss outside off stump that Atapattu drives through the covers for four
good length, away-swinging delivery outside off stump, he shoulders arms
a tad fuller, still moving, and Atapattu kneels down and plays away from his body, steering it to Yuvraj at point
rubbish stuff, really wide down the leg stump, India don't need that from him, the senior bowler in the side
good length away-swinger outside off stump, 140ks, tempting him to drive, but he just shoulders arms
back of a length outside off stump, little more lift on that ball, but Atapattu just covers off stump and raises the arms
again he feeds him a good away-swinger outside off stump, which he leaves alone again
good length ball on middle and leg, turned right to square leg, no chance of a run
moving down leg, he looks for the big swipe over square leg, but misses out and has to settle with a leg bye backward of square
good length ball moving across him, he plants the foot forward and lets it pass
back of a length, good carry to the 'keeper as Atapattu shoulders arms
good length again, moving past him and he leaves it be, very confident of where his off stump is
good length again outside off stump, he comes forward, plays with soft hands away from his body, and does enough to pick up one just wide of Yuvraj at point
fullish delivery just outside off stump, Atapattu comes forward in stoic defense, pinches a run

shorter one this time, he's quickly into position to pull but doesnt time it perfectly, ball still runs past square leg and Ganguly gives chase, but doesnt do all that well, stopping near the ropes to watch the ball go over the ropes
good length on off stump, he gets forward and defends
another good length delivery just outside off stump, Jayasuriya gets forward and jams the angled bat down on it
there's the Agarkar wide for the over, really full and going down the legs, Jayasuriya could've slammed that for four but didnt make contact

fuller this time, moving in from outside off stump, good inswinger, Jayasuriya plonks forward and gets rapped, but hit outside the line of impact, with the ball doing a bit too much, reckons umpire Taufel
fuller delivery on off stump, Jayasuriya pushes it to cover and takes a quick single
not that short a delivery, but Jayasuriya short-arm jabs that over the infield, through the line, and picks up a couple
fullish delivery moving in from outside off stump, he comes forward and times the drive nicely, but cant beat the packed off side field
good length outside off stump, he plonks forward again and defends to the off side
good length outswinger this time, drawing Jayasuriya across his stumps and forcing him to drive loosely at that one, and miss all ends up
good length again, pitches and moves away, Jayasuriya plays at it going forward, and the result is a thick edge wide of second slip, and down at third man Agarkar was too wide, and thats four
good length delivery on the stumps, Jayasuriya goes back and turns it to short midwicket
straight and full on leg stump, he gets into position and flicks, but gets under it and cant beat Ganguly at short midwicket
better ball, good length outside off stump, moving in, he comes forward and defends to the offside with a firm 'NO' back to his partner
sumptious! Overpitched, he gets to the pitch and dispatches the half-volley to the boundary with a classic cover drive
moving down leg again, he gets over it and rolls the wrists, but again cant beat Ganguly on the leg side
back of a length delivery moves in a tad from outside off stump and he defends with soft hands to the backward point
good length again, much closer to off stump and moving in, he stands up and drops the soft hands on it and the ball rolls into the covers, enough for them to pinch the quick single, good running
too straight on the legs and he neatly flicks through midwicket, Ganguly gives chase and manages to haul it in just at the ropes, flipping the ball back to Dravid who then fires in a good throw
bye bye birdie! Overpitched and thats a typical Jayasuriya slap down the ground to long-off for a one-bounce four, just getting under it and playing through the line
good length delivery on off stump, well bowled, and Jayasuriya gets behind the line and pushes it to mid-on for one
good length ball angling across off stump, steered down to third man for one
short of a length delivery on leg stump, he tucks that in front of square leg and set off, but as the fielders converge he wisely returns to his crease
half a dozen! Too full on middle and leg and he just picks it up over square leg for maximum, Jayasuriya at his best!
slower ball, full and moving just a little, Atapattu checks his drive back down the ground, Agarkar gets down to stop it to his right
good length delivery outside off stump, comes forward and pushes it to Karthik in the covers
length ball on off stump, Atapattu shuffles across and neatly drops the wrists over it, and as it rolls to leg he responds to Jayasuriya's call for the run, thats experience
gone! A slower ball again, about a half-volley outside off stump, and Jayasuriya drives off the front foot loosely and chips it straight to Ganguly at cover
too full on the legs, good ball to get first up, and he flicks superbly over square leg for four
good length ball outside off stump, but just, and he comes forward neatly and drives into the covers, calls for the run, and gets it, very positive attitude in his first two deliveries
good length delivery angling down off stump, Jayawardene stands and drops the hands on it and watches the ball roll to cover
going down leg stump and he flicks in the air but well wide of square leg and its collected on the third bounce by Agarkar at fine leg
better ball, good length on the stumps, Atapattu taps it back down the ground  past Zaheer's outstretched left hand and calls for the quick single
another good length ball in the right spot, no room and no chance to drive, and the batsman defends it back to him
back of a length outside off stump, stands up just a little, but Jayawardene adjusts by playing it late and runs it to Yuvraj
drifts down leg stump again and he flicks backward of square out to Agarkar again, and thats Sri Lanka's 50, up in good time

and he's gone! That was a fullish delivery on off stump, and he looks to hit it over the top but didnt even go through with the shot, getting under it instead, and the leading edge goes up, up in the air and settles in Uthappa's hands at cover, Jayawardene fails again
good length ball outside off stump, just, and he comes forward and defends
back of a length outside off stump, he plays away from his body in front of point for the single
wide down the leg stump and he flicks neatly around the corner, ball looks to heading for the boundary but a speedy Zaheer covers ground and stops it
good length, lifting delivery outside off stump and he shoulders arms
good length ball on the stumps, he rolls the wrists on it, looking for runs on the leg side, but cant beat square leg

gone! Zaheer! Fullish delivery outside off stump, in the slot to be driven, but Sangakkara does so loosely, with little footwork and a raised head, and ends up hitting it in the air to Uthappa at cover, who juggles the take and completes in on the third attempt
good length ball on the stumps, he gets right behind the line confidently and defends back to Zaheer
a tad fuller outside off stump, he comes forward and opens the face of the bat, running it to Yuvraj at point
short of a length delivery on off stump, Silva quickly gets back and defends it to Zaheer
slightly fuller this time, on off stump or thereabouts, and he comes well forward and defends it
good length delivery, hitting a great spot again, and Silva gets well over it and defends
good length ball outside off stump, Atapattu plays away from his body and pushes it to point
good length on middle and off, he gets behind it and defends back to Agarkar
back of a length outside off stump, stands up and steers it to backward point, where Yuvraj throws himself to his left and stops it, much to the packed stadium's pleasure
a little width this time, and he steers it down to third man for the single
fullish ball just outside off stump, stays low and he leaves it be
fuller and wider outside off stump, batsman thinks about playing a shot but lets it go, and the umpire calls it wide, a bit harsh, I'd say
bad ball to end the over, too full down the legs and Silva flicks it around the corner, a couple bounces and down to fine, well played
and he strikes first ball! Quick, back of a length delivery outside off stump, to which Atapattu stands and defends, no foot movement, and the ball swings in takes the inside-edge onto off stump
back of a length outside off stump, steered to backward point
good length delivery outside off stump, good lift, and Dilshan leaves it be
fullish this time, with some away swing, Dilshan gets forward and then holds back to the bat to let Dhoni collect it
good length delivery, much closer to off stump, and Dilshan gets half-forward and shoulders arms
fuller, swinging away from him, and he gets rash and flashes the bat it, lucky not to edge to Dhoni!
good length ball moves in from outside off stump, Silva gets behind the line and defends back to Agarkar
a little fuller this time just outside off stump, and Silva gets over it and kills any movement with a dead bat, ball rolls to cover
good length again, more lift outside off stump, stands and lets it pass
good length on off stump, no real movement, Silva again gets behind it and presents a full face of the bat back to Agarkar
fuller and moving away well wide off stump, he comes across the stumps and shoulders arms as Dhoni collects

full and moving away from outside off stump, asking Silva to come and chase it, but he covers his stumps and once more shoulders arms, good bowling this from Agarkar, looks to have settled down nicely
fuller outside off stump, Dilshan plants the foot forward and drives hard to mid-off
fullish again outside off stump, Dilshan flashes the bat at it and gets a thick edge in the gap at gully down to third man for one
back of a length drifting down leg stump, Silva nicely runs it around the corner for one down to Irfan Pathan, on the field for Agarkar, at fine leg...wasnt he rested because of a shoulder niggle?
good length ball moves in sharply from outsid off stump and the batsman gets a clear inside edge onto the pads, no need to appeal for those

fuller this time moving into middle and leg, Dilshan looks to clip it to leg and gets rapped on the pads, looks close and Sreesanth appeals vociferously but the umpire stands unmoved...and replays show it was moving too much down leg stump
good length on off stump, defended towards cover-point
Full in length, outside the off stump, driven to midoff
Whack! Banged in short, on the leg and middle, Dilshan swivels off the front foot, pulls it behind square.
appeal for lbw as the full-length crashes into the pads as Dilshan tries to work it across the stumps. But it had landed outside leg stump.
this one whistles through the channel outside off, Dilshan lets that one fly past him
And again. Pushed across the batsman. In the corridor of temptation. Dilshan shows restraint.
Not so good boy this time. Overpitched on the leg and middle, Silva leans forward, shovels it through midwicket gap. Easy.
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket for a single.
Wah! Elegant! Again full-pitched on the middle stump line, Silva thrusts his left foot across and flicks it through the midwicket gap
appeal for lbw as Silva pads a full-length delivery outside off. It didnt come back enough to cause the damage.

Dilshan is an impatient man. Always looking to strike, to steal runs. On the middle and leg, from a length, and he tries to whip it across the line. Not just work it for a single, he tries to whip it away forecefully and is hit on the pad
angling across the off stump, left alone
And again. Silva lets it go through after covering his offstump.
third time in a row. Deja-vu at Vizag.
similar delivery but Silva had enough of shouldering arms. He leans across.. thrusts his bat out ,away from his body, steers it to point
Strangling line on the off stump, defended on the off stump line.

full in length, outside off stump line, driven back to Sreesanth who makes the stop and threatens to throw it back at the stumps. Cold stare from Sreesanth, Dilshan has seen that one from many a bowler, doesn't bother to respond.
full, angling in, on the middle and leg, turned to square leg

worked to right of mid-on for a quick single. Dilshan thrusts his left foot across a bit too much on occasions and ends up playing around it. This ball too, he had to do that. Could land him in trouble.
probing line on the off and middle, Silva leans forward, stabs at it, the bat-handle rotates in the hand, gets a inside-edge to the pad
fuller, hint of inswing, driven powerfully but straight to cover
on the off and middle, turned towards midwicket, Kartik rushes across to his left and dives full length to make the stop.
turning down leg side, Silva goes back, turns it to short fine leg for a single
turning in from outside the off stump, Dilshan lunges forward to defend
again slides down leg side - as he lands it on the middle stump line, Dilshan eases back, tucks it behind square leg
tossed up outside leg stump, Silva goes for a sweep, his top-hand comes off the handle and he doesn't make contact. Anyways, wide called.
doosra on the off stump line, goes on straight but Silva had spotted it and the bat came down in the line.
Meanwhile Sreesanth is perturbed. Streaky edge past the first and lone slip. Full in length, outside the off stump, Dilshan tries to free his arms and gets a outside edge.
beauty! beaten! The seam is absolutely straight as it hurtles down the track, lands on the off stump line and shapes away, Dilshan pokes at it tentatively inside the line and is beaten.
Again bit of away movement, off the track, Dilshan adjusts to it by opening the face of the bat and runs it down to thirdman
full-pitched on middle and leg, worked to right of Ganguly at midwicket. Dada moves to his right and dives to make the stop.
outswinger and Dilshan pays respect by shouldering his arms
trying too much. Wants to get this one to bend back in but ends up pushing on to the pads and Silva forces it away past square leg
Slap sweep! Take that! Silva goes down on his knee and sweeps it from the middle stump. Past square and it crashes into the advertising hoardings.
again the sweep shot is unfurled. This time behind square, straight to Sreesanth at long leg
Harbhajan continues to land them around middle. Again this one drifts down leg side and wide is called.
Super stop from Kartik! Dilshan works a ball on middle and leg to right of him at square leg and he goes airborne to stop it
Now he tries to correct his line but ends up bowling it well outside the off stump, short in length as well, double error and Dilshan makes him pay. Goes back and across to cut it past point.
fullish, on middle and off, defended off the front foot
runs in briskly, floats one outside off and Silva is cautious. Leans forward, gets close to the line of the ball and drives it towards mid-off. No run.
drags back the length, hits the back of length, and just outside off, Silva quickly moves back, opens the bat-face and cuts it down to thirdman
fuller, just outside off, driven to cover point
drifts on to the pads, Sourav excited Ganguly appeals. Clearly going down leg side and umpire is not interested. The ball rolls over the on side.

Anguish and agony for Dada as a full-length delivery just shaves past the off stump. Dangerously close. It landed around off stump and held its line, Silva's bat came down the wrong line, outside the line and doesn't get a touch. Dhoni is also surprised at how it missed the off stump and doesn't quite get his gloves behind that one and it bounds off for a bye
on the middle and leg, worked to square leg
Another wide. Again Harbhajan is operating on that leg stump line. Starting the turn from middle stump and it goes down leg side
Silva is flying. So is the white ball. He dances down the track and sends a flighted delivery soaring over mid-on
This one flies over the cuckoo's nest. Disappears over long off. Down he comes down the track again and lofts it into the stands. Glorious strike. Nonchalantly played.
Wah! Very fine sweep. Harbhajan floats this one on the leg stump line, Silva goes down on his knee and creams it fine.
Another sweep shot but he is not balanced well while executing and ends up waving it away. Goes in the air but drops safely and rolls over to long leg
again lands on middle, turns down leg, flicked for a single. Expensive over comes to an end.
on the middle and leg, worked past square leg for a single
outside off this time, Silva dabs it down to thirdman
Slightly short of length, outside off stump, punched off the back foot to deep point
strays on to the pads, flicked past square leg for couple of runs
Runs keep coming. Full and outside off, Silva leans forward and steers it past Yuvraj at point for a single.
full and straight, Dilshan stays beside the line of the delivery, punches it down to long on
finally hits the off stump line, pushed to point
back to leg stump line, worked to deep midwicket where Agarkar fields.
russian roulette here. Back to outside off, turns in and Silva is beaten in flight, stabs at it and gets an inside edge to the leg side
again just outside the off stump, Dilshan, goes down on his knee, tries to sweep it away, it misses his broom and raps him on the left shoulder
on the middle and leg, swept away past square leg.
comes down the track to work a tossed-up delivery through the on side but no contact and is rapped on the pads
Fuller, outside the off stump, pushed to cover

Uthappa takes a beauty! Full and outside off, driven on the up and it was dropping short of Uthappa at cover who takes a few steps forward and dives to take it inches off the ground. Gets on his feet, takes the cap of his head and bows in a dramatic style, like a performer on stage, to the crowd even as the fielders mob him. Third batsman getting out driving on the up.
pushes that one across Arnold who lets it go through to Dhoni
slower, outside off, again Silva opens his bat-face, runs it down to thirdman
fuller and on the middle stump line, pushed back down the track. Good over that from Ganguly. Just two runs and a wicket of Dilshan. Not a bad bargain.
tossed up outside the off stump, pushed to cover point for a single.
well-flighted, lands outside off, turns away as Arnold shoulders arms
this one is on the off stump line, Arnold leans forward, taps it close on the off side, wants a run but realises that would have been a suicide and goes back.
spins past Arnold and into Dhoni's gloves
lands on the off and middle, turns, Arnold stretches forward and nudges it to on side
teasing line on the off stump, dabbed to the off side
slides in from a length, on off and middle, nudged to the on side, behind square leg. Ganguly respects the two L's. Line and length. Not what I wrote in the last game.
faster, straighter, no room for Arnold to work around. Just stabs it to the leg side.
kicks from a length, and Arnold tries to work it away to the leg side and is rapped on the waist
Bosh! Clean strike! Full-pitched, just outside the off stump, down comes the bat, under the ball and sends it flying over long-off. Smooth!
retains the strike with a drive to wide mid-on
On the middle stump line, nudged to midwicket for a single
flatter, just outside the off stump, Silva goes down his back knee and sweeps it square. He does that quite well, sweeps in front of square.
goes back to a delivery turning from off stump, works it to past square leg
turns from off and middle stump line, steered to backward point
short and wide, asking for trouble, but he cant time the cut past backward point
straight on the stumps, worked off the pads into midwicket for one
straight on middle stump, worked to square leg with ease
drifts down leg stump and he turns it wide of short fine leg for another run
fuller this time, just outside off stump, he comes forward and dead-bats that back to Ganguly
full outside off stump, inviting the drive, Silva leans into it and steers it to backward point, where Yuvraj dives and fields
tossed up invitingly outside off stump, pitches and spins away, Arnold leaves it alone
tossed up again, he comes forward and defends
flatter this time, Arnold plants the foot in line of the ball and sweeps hard through square leg for one
tossed up on off stump, Silva defends going forward and the inside-edge runs fine to short fine leg
quicker, flatter and it almost squares him up but he adjusts and keeps it down to the off side
tossed up, pitches outside the line of the off stump and Silva goes for the sweep, but misses, and umpire Taufel shakes his head to Bhajji's appeal
good length delivery down the leg side, Arnold glances it to fine leg
good length delivery outside off stump, Silva steers it down to third man
wide ball, down the leg side
back of a length outside offstump, punched off the backfoot to long-off
good length outside off stump, Silva opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
good length delivery down the legs, Arnold glances it to fine leg for a brace
flighted on the stumps, Silva comes on the frontfoot and defends
quicker and flatter this time, Silva opens the face of the bat and plays that to gully
tossed up on middle and leg, Silva comes down the track and looks to sweep it but gets beaten by the doosra
tossed up on leg stump, turns it to short midwicket
short of a length outside off stump, cut past point for one
flatter outside off stump, Arnold goes back and drives to sweeper cover
Thwack! Short and on the off stump line, Arnold rocks back to pull it over midwicket
Slap! Again short and well outside off, Arnold reaches out and cuts it to deep point
well-flighted delivery, lands on middle, turns across Silva who tucks it to short fine leg

Almost caught by Yuvraj at short fine leg! Silva reaches a very fine fifty with a bit of risk and danger. It was tossed up on the middle and he went for his favourite sweep. Top-edged it to left of Yuvraj who charged after it and dived full length but couldn't reach to it
fuller, on the middle and off, driven to long off
tossed up outside leg stump, Arnold goes for the sweep but fails to make contact, Sehwag appeals but that was outside the line of impact
flighted on the stumps, Silva comes on the frontfoot and defends
tossed up fuler, Silva comes on the frontfoot and drives it to cover point
tossed up on off stump, Silva gets forward and turns it around the corner for runs
tossed up on off stump, Arnold plants the foot forward and rolls the wrists over it, picking the gap at mid-on

quicker and flatter, its dipping into leg stump as Silva advances down the track, but he plays with the spin and flicks hard in the air in the gap at midwicket and finds the deep midwicket ropes, shot!
tossed up down leg stump, he Silva goes back and glances it to short fine leg
quick and flat outside off stump, Arnold rocks back and punches to cover
gone! Quick and short again, Arnold gets back to pull but cant get away with it, getting under it and lofting it down to Sreesanth at a wide long-on, who doesnt have to move much to hold an easy take
full and dipping into off stump, he comes down the track and chips to midwicket
tossed up on off stump, Maharoof looks to turn it fine but mistimes the shot and short fine leg fields
flat outside off stump, he gets down and sweeps through square for one
flat again, Silva uses the feet well to meet the ball on the full and drive the single down to long-on, good batting this
short and wide to begin with, Silva rocks back and cracks it through the off side circle out to the sweeper
fuller this time, and Maharoof gets to the pitch and drives excellently past mid-off for four, all timing in that
good length ball, slower too, sucking him into a leaden-footed drive in the air, but luckily for him its past mid-off and he gets one
short outside off stump, not enough room to cut so Silva swivels and pulls into the ground, ball rolls to midwicket
good length outside off stump and coming in, he stands tall and defends back to Sreesanth
back of a length outside off stump, he comes onto the front foot and drives on the up to the covers
tossed up down leg stump, but Silva's already down the track and takes it on the full, flicking in the gap between square leg and midwicket out to the deep
flatter this time on off stump, he comes forward and works that into square leg
off line, down leg stump, and he sweeps hard down to fine leg, where Zaheer moves very well and fires in a good throw
shortish delivery on the stumps, Maharoof goes on the backfoot and plays it back to Sehwag
tossed up on off stump, Maharoof tries to come down but the ball dips on him and he has to defend to Sehwag
flatter this time and Maharoof is stuck in the crease, and he defends it again, good bowling
overpitched and thats a crunching drive, on the go, from Silva out to Ganguly on the deep cover ropes
overpitched again, but Maharoof cant time his version of a nice cover drive past the infield
back of a length this time outside off stump, he stands and looks to force it through the off side, but the inside-edges carries the ball to square leg instead
short of a length outside off stump, and with no room to cut, Silva shuffles and works it into midwicket
fuller this time, on a yorker length, he jams the bat down and the edge takes it down to third man
shorter outside off stump, again not enough room to cut, so he moves into position for the  pull and keeps it down in front of short midwicket as the ball stood up on him
Sehwag starts off the 'death overs' with a wide down the leg sdie
Ah! reverse sweep. Takes it on full toss, reverse sweeps it through short thirdman

almost run out! Direct hit from Sreesanth. Pushed to cover point and they set off. Sreesanth swooped on it and he threw the non-striker's sticks down. But the throw was not flat and fast and third umpire confirms that the batsman had made his crease.
Down the leg side, Maharoof tries to sweep it fine, doesn't connect and it runs past Dhoni
Sehwag is being swept away. With force and precision. Again in front of square and it bissects long leg and deep midwicket. Super strike!
starts off with a slower one. Full and straight, Maharoof is leaning forward, waits for the ball, works it towards square-leg for a single

Action! Fullish delivery was drilled straight down the track, it cleans up the furniture at the other end even as Maharoof dives back into the crease. Agarkard didn't get a hand on it, turns and sees one of the bails flying towards him. Catches it calmly.
quick single, driven to mid-off and Silva reaches into his crease with a dive. The throw didn't hit the sticks though.
Boom! Banged in short, outside off stump, Maharoof came forward and swatted it over cover!
slower one! Again short of length, Maharoof is through with his shot - tries to play it over midwicket and misses
Attempted yorker, ends up as a low full toss, drilled to cover. No ball as well. Hmm...
Good old inside-edge past the leg stump and almost past fine-leg ropes but Agarkar intervenes. Slow yorker on the off stump, Maharoof is early into his drive, gets a edge
Easy single with a mis-timed drive towards cover.
Umpire Saheba extends his arms. Wide down the leg side.
Super inside-out drive! Full-pitched on the middle and off, he leans forward to drive it inside-out through covers. Top shot.
Low full toss, another attempted yorker, shovelled through midwicket. 50 of the partnership up. In just 39 delveries. Great going.
another one at the blockhole, on the leg and middle stump line, dug out to right of zaheer who moves across to make a diving stop
beaten! Change of pace. Pushed across Maharoof who tries to run it down to thirdman. The bat meets air, the ball meets Dhoni's gloves.
Wah! Just below waist high, full toss on the middle stump line, Silva leans across, laps it around the corner, to fine leg boundary. Innovative stuff.
bouncer. One for the over, signals Mr Taufel. Silva had ducked under that.
Biffed away. Full and straight, perfect for the slog, he drills it down the ground
punched down the ground. Good diving stop from Kartik at long off, moving to his right.
full-pitched on the middle stump line, driven to long on
Boom Boom! Another yorker goes awry. Ends up as a low full toss and Maharoof got his bat under the ball and swung it over long on

Zak hits back.  Another low full toss but this time Maharoof looped it towards extra cover. Kartik takes the dolly. Good cameo from Maharoof comes to an end as we hurtle further towards the end of the Sri Lankan innings. Remember this is a 47-overs game.
on a length, around off stump, driven to cover for a single
Silva continues to dazzle. Another innovative flick of the wrist. Slower one on the middle stump line, Silva moved right across the stumps, and flicks it fine. Very fine.
And again, we see that magical flick of the wrist. This was outside off stump, full in length, he just leans across, and waves it behind squareleg.
low full toss, on the off stump line, punched down the ground, to the right of Harbhajan Singh at long off
Bangs it short of length, around off and middle, Silva lets it go past him.
Again slightly short of length, on the middle, swatted to deep midwicket
bouncer. On the leg stump line. Silva ducks under, his bat hanging out like a periscope.
short and at the body, no room to cut, so he swats it away to the leg side
Silva lining for Sri Lanka! Banged in short, at the body, on the middle stump line, Silva moves right across the stumps, pulls it down to the fine leg boundary.
overpitched on the stumps, driven to long on. Smart. Will retain the strike.
Fullish, outside off stump, Silva, again, walks across the stumps but since this one was outside off, couldn't help it to leg side, drives towards extra cover. has to settle for a single.
again well outside the off stump, no ball as well, Bandara stays where he is and slices it over point.

What a knock! Brilliant 100 from Silva. 1st ODI hundred. Superb stuff. He backs away to the leg side, Sreesanth hurls across a full-toss, above the waist-high, on the leg stump line, Silva adjusts, opens the bat-face and runs it down fine through the vacant slip region. This is just his 14th ODI game and what a innings from him.
Sailing down the leg side, clips the pad enroute to Dhoni
full and around off, driven for a single to extra cover

Edged and dropped by Dhoni. Tough chance. It was banged in short of length and outside the off stump, Bandara was backing outside leg stump, reaches out to it and frees his arms, gets a thick edge and it flies to right of Dhoni who dives but ends up palming it to thirdman
Flick of stardom! He moves right across the stumps, the ball is honing in on the middle, and he clips it to fine leg. This boy is going to be a star for Sri Lanka.

Nearly flick of disaster! Again full but this was outside off, Silva tries to repeat his earlier stroke - that flick across the line, gets a leading edge which flies over backward point, towards short thirdman. Yuvraj Singh sets off after the ball, reaches to it but clangs it.  Fabulous innings from Silva. 107 not out. Run a ball.

inn2.comm: good length outside the off stump, but he's overstepped and Maharoof begins poorly again
short of a length outside off stump, up on the toes goes Sehwag chasing it, and he places it in the gap behind square for one down to third man
back of a length on the stumps, tucked for room, and he defends standing tall back to Maharoof
bad ball, way down the leg side, Ganguly tried to flick it away but it was too far away from the bat even, good work by Sangakkara behind the stumps
short-pitched delivery into his ribs, takes him by surprise and he pulls very unconvingly to square leg, with eyes and hand off the bat, but gets one
short of a length and very wide outside off stump, another wide in a very average over
wider! Maharoof bowled a horrific first over in the last game in Goa, and this is no better...just too wide and moving away significantly outside off stump
back of a length down leg stump, Sehwag flicks that to leg but cant beat square leg, Tharanga, the substitute fielder
this lands on a good length just outside off stump and Sehwag punches that superbly down the ground for four
back of a length and coming in, he counters it by covering off stump and defending it back to Maharoof, who's had a bad over
quick, good length delivery just outside off stump, Uthappa gets caught on the forward-press and the thick edge flies low and fast down to third man for four, lucky!
well bowled! Fuller one outside off stump, draws Uthappa forward tamely and then deviates from the outside edge of his blade, that was close
beaten again! Quick delivery on a sweet length outside off stump, pitches and moves away again, and Uthappa lunges forward on the drive and gets beaten by the pace
straighter one, this time he gets behind the line and defends it back to Malinga
lands on a good length outside off stump and Uthappa pushes that into the offside gap, Jayasuriya gives chase from cover and hauls it in near the ropes
wide down the pads, and the umpire spreads his arms to signal as much
back of a length outside off stump, Uthappa stands and punches that just wide of of mid-off for a quick single
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and opens the face of the bat, running it to Dilshan at backward point
short of a length angled into his ribs, but he rolls the wrists and places it in front of Tharanga at square leg, Sehwag sets off the down the track and is sent back, wisely
just too full down the legs and Uthappa cant connect on the flick, wide signalled
short of a length on middle and off, he stands and turns it to short midwicket
back of a length on middle and leg, turned in front of square leg off the hips
full and wide, Uthappa just stands and gives it the kitchen sink, and is beaten all ends up
overpitched again and he thumps a drive off the front foot right to Jayasuriya at mid-off
short of a length just outside off stump, he pushes to mid-off on the hop
short and wide, he rocks back and slaps it to the off side, but theres an electric Dilshan at backward point to collect it
bad ball, wayward down the legs and its another wide
on a shortish length on leg stump, up goes Sehwag, with good balance, turning it off the hips all the way to the deep midwicket ropes
fullish on leg stump, he flicks wide of Fernando at mid-on and picks up two, though he was sent back going for the third
back of a length outside off stump, Sehwag stands tall and defends to the off side
back of a length on off stump, up on the toes again goes Sehwag and he defends very comfortably, and confidently, back to the bowler
fullish outside off stump, he comes forward and drives but cant beat mid-off
good length but on the legs, and he turns it to square leg
short outside off stump, he swivels into position very quickly and slams it hard over square leg for four, impressively done by Uthappa
good length outside off stump, he comes onto the frontfoot and drives to Jayawardene at short extra cover
bad ball, way down the leg stump and its a wide
short again and Uthappa is not on the backfoot but still goes through with the pull, its not timed well but has enough on it to carry it safely in no man's land near the deep midwicket ropes
short and wide outside off stump, he's on the front foot again but goes through with a smashing slap past short extra cover for four, shot!
back of a length on the stumps, he stands up and defends to short midwicket
strays down the leg side and Sehwag just helps it on its way down to fine leg for four
back of a length on middle and off, he gets into position and drives off the back foot to mid-off, looking good is this man
again this is down leg stump and Sehwag tucks it wide of square for one out to fine leg
back of a length outside off stump, Uthappa comes forward and checks the drive to mid-off, then calls for the risky single
back of a length outside off stump, he gets back and drives off the backfoot to cover
begins with a juicy half-volley outside off stump, and he leans into it and smashes that all the way to the deep cover ropes
good length on middle and leg, Uthappa turns it to short midwicket for one
overpitched again and Sehwag square-cuts through backward point for one to the man moving around from third man
bad bowling, too much down the legs and with fine leg up, Uthappa turns it square for four, well played
AGAIN he fires one down the legs and Uthappa flicks it wide of a diving Sangakkar for four more, bringing up the 50 in rapid time
good length on the stumps, he just leaned into it and drove, on the up, wide of mid-on for another four, and this man is just taking it to Sri Lanka with some authoritative shots
another ball on the legs and Sehwag shuffles across and works it in the gap at midwicket for a brace
moving down leg stump again, and Sehwag is caught on the hop
good length outside off stump, he opens the face of the bat and runs it fine, but Dilshan dives at backward point to save runs
drifts to leg again and Sehwag clips out to deep backward square leg for one
bang! Dropped in short on off stump and Uthappa swings across the line, timing it superbly over midwicket for four, thats disdain for you!
now its a full toss which Uthappa is surprised by, and why not at that pace, and he  gloves it into the ground, but Malinga appeals very emphatically
width on offer and he chases it, but its gets some lift of the surface that beats him
good length delivery moving in from outside off stump, Sehwag meets it and gets rapped on the pad, but he had moved enough outside the line of impact
straighter one on the stumps, he turns it to short midwicket
on a short length on leg stump, he flicks but doesnt time it well and has to settle for a leg bye in front of short fine leg
close! This one moves in off a good length and Uthappa just swings the bat it, eyeing the on side, but is saved by an inside-edge back onto the pads
short of a length outside off stump, he opens the face of the bat and picks up two down to third man
overpitched but Sehwag's punch-drive cant beat cover
hah! Again he gets one too full and down leg stump, and he murders the flick all the way down to fine leg, shot!
shorter one on middle and leg, up on one leg goes Sehwag, rolling the wrists over it to keep it down past square leg, and a diving slide on the fine leg ropes from Atapattu saves the four
SIX! The attempted bouncer goes all wrong as it was down leg, and Uthappa got onto the backfoot and hooked it rows back into the screaming fans down at fine leg
slower, fuller and swinging, and Uthappa hurries forward and squeezes it to point, not convincingly done
fuller on the stumps, he shuffles and drives to mid-on
good length, swinging delivery comes into him but he opens the face and runs it wide of point, but is sent back as that man Dilshan swoops into the picture
banged into the rib cage, he hops up in the air and plays it very well into the ground near his feet
short and wide, he stands up and runs it past where second slip could have been and gets one to third man
back of a length outside off stump, he shuffles forward and drops the hands on it, keeping it low in front of point
whoof! Slammed over cover and mid-off, off the front foot, with utter disdain, and thats his third ODI fifty off 33 balls
this one's straighter on the stumps and he drives to mid-on
good length outside off stump, a slow delivery, which Sehwag drives to cover
slow on a good length, he comes forward initially but then adjusts to play it with soft hands past gully for one to third man
good length outside off stump, no pace, he opens the face and runs it down to third man as well
short of a length, stands up and comes in, Sehwag arches his back and runs it off the face of the bat down to third man again
back of a length outside off stump, Uthappa gets antsy and swings at it, getting an inside-edge to short midwicket

all over for Uthappa! He failed to control his aggression, getting forward and under a back of a length delivery, and scooping it over the infield and down to the safe hands of Jayasuriya at wide mid-off
good length outside off stump, Karthik drives to point
back of a length delivery on the stumps, Karthik goes on the backfoot and defends it
good length outside off stump, moves in and Karthik gets an inside-edge perilously close to leg stump, that was close!
drifts down leg stump and Karthik falls over on the hop, bowler appeals very, very loudly but umpire Taufel shakes his head, reckoning that ball was doing too much
back of a length outside off stump, he defends to the off side
close again! This one kicks off a short length outside off stump and Karthik hops up and chases it, and is lucky not have edged it
good length wide of off stump, Sehwag leans forward and at the last second very intentionally opens the face to run it down to the third man ropes, very, very cheeky
even better! This one's short of a length outside off stump, giving him the opportunity to rock up on the toes and crunch it wide of point for four more
perhaps conscious of the last two balls, Maharoof drifts this down leg and Sehwag clips it to short fine leg for one, leg byes is the answer
now he thinks he's Sehwag and flirts with an attempted late dab to third man, but is nowhere near the ball
dropped! Short and wide, Karthik's feet go nowhere as he slaps a cut right into the  lap of Dilshan at point, but its in and out, as he lets go a sitter
cracked! But not Sehwag, who cashes in on another short delivery by dispatching it to the deep backward point boundary, well played

well held, sir! And well bowled! Fernando drops a good lifter under Karthik's nose, and all he can do is hop and fend for himself, with bat out in front of body, and the leading edge is snapped up by Fernando himself, diving to his left
down the leg side and its not called wide as Ganguly shuffled across and exposed his leg stump....hmmmm
good length just outside off stump and he defends neatly to the off side
dragged in short and he pulls weakly into the ground and gets one past Jayasuriya at mid-on
short and wide, up he goes, steering it wide of Dilshan for one out to the sweeper
fullish delivery, he comes forward and steers it to point
very good delivery! Kicks from a length, Sehwag stabs at it but intelligently takes out the bottom-hand out of the handle and turns it down to wide thirdman
full, fast, straight, on middle and off, Ganguly eases it out to cover region
Full and on the middle and leg, Ganguly works it to left of mid-on for a single
Short and wide, slapped past point to wide thirdman
Good change of pace. Full and just outside off, Ganguly spots it, pushes it out to the off side
on the middle and leg, worked to the leg side.
Full and on the middle and off, Sehwag gets behind the line, pushes it out back down the track
on the middle stump line, whipped past square-leg
Wow! Banged in short, at the body, Ganguly, crouching forward, stands up tall and pulls it over long leg, amidsts flag-waving ecstatic fans.
From round the stumps this time. Full and on the middle stump line, Ganguly leans forward, eases it out towards mid-on
almost scooped to cover! Good slower one, full in length, delivered with a wide split-finger grip on either side of the seam, Ganguly drives and it falls short of cover
comes in from outside off, from the angle, Ganguly offers the full-face of the bat in defense

OMG! what a way to get out. Sleepwalking to his own demise but what a smart work from Sangakkara. Short  and outside off stump, Sehwag frees his arms and it flies down to thirdman. Sehwag walks across. The ball reaches Sangakkara. Sehwag is now very very near the crease. Sangka spots a opportunity, takes out his gloves and fires a throw at the non-striker's end. And what is happening there? Sleepwalking Sehwag has turned just before the crease, his feet on the line, and turns to see what's happening at the other end. The ball flies past him to crash into the furniture! And he is out! Referred upstairs and he is gone! Fab stuff from Sangka! Sehwag was playing so well, looking in control and there he combusts in a bizarre fashion.
full  and on the off stump line, driven to mid-off
Short of length, just outside off stump, Ganguly stabs at it, bat-face opened, and gets a inside-edge. Dangerously close to the off stump.
full, straight, no movement whatsover, Ganguly gets behind the line and defends
climbs from short of length, at the body, Yuvraj hops up, takes the bottom-hand out of the handle, and fends it away
comes in from outside off stump, punched back down the track
fuller, honing in on the off stump, Yuvraj leans forward, opens the bat-face, steers it to backward point
Caressed away for a six! Full and drifting down leg side, Yuvraj leans forward and flicks it away. Up, Up and over long leg. Pure timing and oodles of class.
short of length, outside off, guided to point
full and on the middle, the same ball he bowled in the last game to take out Ganguly, but this time Ganguly doesn't attempt to sweep, pushes it out to midwicket
lands on a length, on middle and leg, turns, Ganguly goes back, works it past square-leg
fuller, bit more air, outside off, enough for Yuvraj to lean forward and drive it straight. right-elbow high, head still and a lovely full follow-through.
turns in from outside off, played away to backward point
flighted on the leg and middle stump, Yuvraj flicks it with the turn to deep midwicket
drifting in on the middle and off, Yuvraj goes back, turns it to midwicket
Mahela is flying. Yuvraj cuts a shortish delivery to left of him at cover and the Sri Lankan captain dives to make the stop
turned to left of midwicket for a single
floated on the middle and leg, Ganguly leans forward, pushes at it, gets a inside-edge to his pad. Dilshan appeals, Taufel doesn't share in the optimism
full and just outside off, driven to Mahela at cover
comes down the track, reaches the pitch of a looping delivery outside off and drives past cover
Imperious! 175th six for Ganguly. He waltzes down the track, backing away from legstump in the process, and sends the ball screaming over long off.
driven to long off for a single
on the leg and middle, flicked away to the right of deep square leg for a single. Ganguly comes back on strike. Will he go down the wicket again?
Googly that lands on the middle stump line, Ganguly itching to come forward, spots the variation and defends. Good delivery that.
on the middle, orthodox legbreak, nudged to the on side
just outside off, driven to cover
Yuvraj still unhappy with the sightscreen. He is getting agitated there, frantically waving. Now he is ready. leans forward, drives to long off for a single
drifting in on middle and leg, whipped to deep square leg
floated on the middle and leg, flicked away past square leg for a single
comes in with the arm, quickish, pushed out in a hurry, towards point.
On the middle and leg, turned past square-leg and Ganguly turns back for two. He hares down the track, the throw is not accurate and he makes it in time.
Yuvraj gets Ganguly back on strike with a drive to long off
googly on the off stump line, slightly short, Ganguly backs away, makes room and forces it to sweeper cover
Elegant off drive. Easy on the eye. Down the track and he meets the ball flush in the middle of the bat and caresses it past the bowler and past the ropes at long-off.
driven through off side ring for a single. Runs are coming very easily for the Indians.
floated on the middle and off, pushed back down the track
similar line again, Yuvraj takes a small step forward, punch-drives it to long off for a single
drifting on to the pads, tickled fine to  backward squareleg
another single down to long off.
outside off, full, no turn, Yuvraj plays for some and gets a leading edge back down the track
this time there is no confusion in Yuvi's mind, drives it deliberately back to the bowler
enough of poking. leans forward to whip a delivery from outside off to deep midwicket
Ganguly takes up the Yuvi routine. Leans forward, drives back to Jayasuriya
slightly short, quicker, worked to midwicket
perfect forward defensive stroke. Lull before the storm?
lands on a length, just outside off, turns away, Yuvraj pushes at it, unsure whether it would turn or not - can't blame him, not much has turned, and gets an outside edge to short thirdman
leans forward this time, covers the line and drives to long on
floated on the off stump, punched past cover
Milking around. This one is tickled behind square-leg.
just outside off, Ganguly tries to pinch a single with a drive towards right of cover but doesn't send it too much to his right
goes back to the stumps, works to midwicket.
Ah! guess where this one went? Yep, back to the bowler
Aha! no one will be yawning after this. Ganguly glides down the track and swings a tossed-up delivery into the deep midwicket stands. Would have woken up a few there.
Ganguly gets off strike with a drive to long on
flighted, too full, Yuvraj stretches forward, on-drives elegantly to long on.
on the leg stump line, worked to midwicket. Delivered from slightly round-armish action.
full and straight, on the off stump line, pushed to cover
flatter on the middle and leg stump line, Yuvraj leans forward, tries to whip it across the line, gets a leading edge to cover
strangling line on the off and middle, no pace or room to work with, nudged to on side
First run of this over. A drive to long off.
tossed up down the leg side, Yuvraj goes on the backfoot and glances it to fine leg
flighted delivery on middle and leg, Ganguly comes on the frontfoot and turns it to square leg
tossed up outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to mid-off
tossed up on leg stump, Ganguly comes on the frontfoot and turns it to short mid wicket
tossed up, Ganguly comes on the frontfoot and drives it to cover
tossed up on leg again, Yuvraj glances it to short fine leg
short of a length outside off stump, Ganguly cuts it square of the wicket
tosses up on the stumps, Yuvraj comes on the frontfoot and defends it
tossed up on middle and leg, Yuvraj turns it to short midwicket
flighted down the leg side, Yuvraj goes on the backfoot and turns it to square leg
tossed up middle and leg, Yuvraj drives it to long-on for one
tossed up on off stump, Yuvraj pushes it straight to the fielder at cover
shorter and flatter, he opens the face of the bat and plays that to gully
tossed up, Yuvraj comes on the frontfoot and drives it to long-off
tossed up, he drives to short extra cover
bang goes Gang! Comes down the track, giving himself room, and slams a flat delivery all the way down to long-on for his first boundary
tossed up on the stumps, Ganguly comes on the frontfoot and defends it solidly
tossed up again and he patiently taps it back to Dilshan
but not this time, as he shimmies down the track and connects well on the slog down to long-on
quicker and flatter, still he uses the feet well to drive, inside-out, wide of mid-on for one
tossed up again, he comes forward and drives out to the sweeper for one
short of a length delivery on middle and leg, Yuvraj goes on the backfoot and drives it to long-on
flat on the stumps, he shuffles and turns it into midwicket and runs down the track, a good throw comes in and hits the stumps but he was safe
fullish outside off stump, he leans into a good-looking cover drive to short extra cover
width offered and he deftly places that, off the backfoot, in the gap behind point and even a despairing dive on the ropes cant stop that shot
good length outside off stump, he walks into a drive but gets an inside-edge into the ground, and has to get  back into his crease as the big man Fernando collects it
wow! Overpitched well outside off stump, and Yuvraj gets down on bended knee, frees the arms, and hits that flat as a bloody whistle over cover-point for four, and thats his 26th ODI fifty
short and wide, and rising, but he counters the extra lift by uppercutting over Sangakkara and down to third man, on the bounce
bounces him down the leg stump, and he ducks under it as it passes
quicker and flatter, he uses the feet first but has to adjust to the length and defends
shorter and flatter outside off stump, and he stands and punches down to long-off for one
straighter on the stumps, he shuffles and turns it past short fine leg for one
more air this time, he comes down and then has to defend as he wasnt to the pitch
tossed up on the stumps, Ganguly comes on the frontfoot and defends it solidly
short and wide, and Ganguly rocks back and slaps it wide of point, where a diving stop on the ropes helps the ball over the boundary for four
fractionally short and he cuts hard but cant beat backward point
ohhhh! An express, round-arm, swinging yorker on the stumps that Yuvraj somehow manages to get bat on and splice into the off side, near point
another yorker, into the batsman, but Ganguly also manages to get bat on it and tuck it away to the off side
fullish outside off stump, Ganguly drops the bat on it but cant beat the off side, where there's a point and backward point
full on the legs, Ganguly works it in the gap between mid-on and midwicket and runs for one
full outside off stump, Yuvraj opens the face and splices that wide of backward point for one to retain strike
welcome back, says Yuvraj, advancing down the track and picking a tossed up delivery from middle and leg for a flat-batted six over wide long-on!
fizzed up down the leg side, Yuvraj goes on the backfoot and turns it to square leg
comes down the track but isnt to the pitch and quickly brings the bat down
nice! Tossed up on leg stump and he neatly sweeps that past short fine leg for four
quicker and flatter outside off stump, he uses the feet and drives out to the cover sweeper
looped up on middle and leg, Ganguly waits for it and then turns the wrists to pick up one in front of square leg
good yorker outside off stump, he jams the bat down and squeezes it to backward point

full on the legs, and he easily works that past square leg out to the fielder in the deep to bring up another ODI half-century....the crowd loves it...and people wrote this man off...Ganguly raises the bat and triumphant fists
short of a length outside off stump, he steers it down to third man
dropped in short, he swivels on the pull and doesnt connect very well but does get one over square leg
full on middle and leg, and Yuvraj clips that over mid-on and midwicket for four, well played, sir
the yorker goes wrong again, as its too full outside off stump, but Yuvraj cant put it away as his drive goes to mid-off
blasted away! Lands on a short length outside leg stump, Ganguly backs away and slams that through mid-on for another four
strays down leg stump and Ganguly works it around the corner out to fine leg for an easy single
this one was slower, the offcutter, it seems, and Yuvrvaj's one-legged attempt at a pull across the line connected with only air
short of a length on middle and leg, pulled through midwicket for one out to the man in the deep
slower yorker on off stump, dug out back towards Fernando's right
full ball, almost a low full toss on middle and leg, Ganguly backs away to expose the stumps but connects well with his drive and picks up one past mid-off
shorter outside off stump, easy for him to rock back and punch the drive out to cover sweeper
quick, flat and spinning past leg stump as the umpire calls it wide
flat trajectory again, on middle and leg, Yuvraj stands tall and punches wide of mid-on for one
gives it some air outside off stump, he gets forward and drives to cover
quicker this time on middle and leg, and Ganguly plays an awkward defensive...is he cramping again?
flat outside off stump, cut hard to point
Yuvraj meanwhile continues to flow.  Leans forward, reaches the pitch of a full-length delivery on the middle and leg and whips it through wide mid-on.
And again. Classy  and fluent on drive. Eye-catching stroke. Stands upright and unfurls a lovely on drive
Wow! Yuvraj is looting runs as the sun goes down. Low full toss, on the middle, disappears over wide long on. Whack!
Carved past backward point. Another full toss, Sri Lanka are gift-wrapping boundaries here, smoked past point.

That's it. Yuvraj seals the series-win with a whip over midwicket. A full-length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, he walks down the track and swings it over the on side. Plastic water bottles are being thrown onto the outfield in celebration! Weird way to celebrate. Now an invasion has occured. The crowd have broken through the barriers and are all over the arena. Scenes from old time. From an another era. The spectators used to carpet the arena and stand outside the dressing room. Similar scenes here.
